Class Scoreboard

java.lang.Object
Scoreboard
public class Scoreboard
extends java.lang.Object
The Scoreboard keeps track of the timing for menus and the overall score of the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Scoreboard()
    Creates a new Scoreboard with time and score as 0.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Scoreboard getInstance()
    Uses singleton to create a scoreboard that other classes can access.
    int getScore()  
    long getTime()
    Gets the current time in seconds that the scoreboard is at.
    void pause()
    Stops the timer from continuing.
    void resume()
    Resume the timer by getting the time it was stopped for and calculating it's current time.
    void secretTimeResetMethod()
    Resets the startTime to whenever the current time is.
    void setScore​(int n)
    Adds to the score by the parameter n.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Scoreboard

      public Scoreboard()
      Creates a new Scoreboard with time and score as 0. Along with the startTime being the current time.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Scoreboard getInstance()
      Uses singleton to create a scoreboard that other classes can access.
      Returns:
      the current instance of the object to the caller.

    • getTime

      public long getTime()
      Gets the current time in seconds that the scoreboard is at.
      Returns:
      the current time the scoreboard has.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Stops the timer from continuing. Gets the time in which it called pause.

    • resume

      public void resume()
      Resume the timer by getting the time it was stopped for and calculating it's current time.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns:
      the current score.

    • setScore

      public void setScore​(int n)
      Adds to the score by the parameter n.
      Parameters:
      n - amount to be added to score.

    • secretTimeResetMethod

      public void secretTimeResetMethod()
      Resets the startTime to whenever the current time is. This is used so the displayed timer resets when leaving the main menu.
